---
title: "otlp.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines configuration settings for tracing in a software system. It specifically configures OpenTelemetry (OTLP) tracing with custom parameters including enabling tracing, setting the exporter, sampling ratio, and OTLP-specific settings.

## Symbols

### `tracing`
#### Description
The root configuration block for tracing settings.

#### Internal Logic
This block contains all the tracing-related configuration options, including general settings and OTLP-specific settings.

___

### `enabled`
#### Description
A boolean flag to enable or disable tracing.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | When set to `true`, tracing is enabled for the system. |

___

### `exporter`
#### Description
Specifies the tracing exporter to be used.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| exporter | string | Set to `"otlp"` to use the OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP) exporter. |

___

### `sampling_ratio`
#### Description
Defines the sampling ratio for tracing.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| sampling_ratio | float | A value between 0 and 1 that determines the proportion of traces to be sampled. Here, it's set to 0.5, meaning 50% of traces will be sampled. |

___

### `otlp`
#### Description
A nested configuration block for OTLP-specific settings.

#### Internal Logic
This block contains settings specific to the OTLP exporter, including the endpoint and headers.

___

### `endpoint`
#### Description
Specifies the endpoint URL for the OTLP exporter.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| endpoint | string | The URL where the OTLP exporter will send trace data. Set to `"http://localhost:9999"` in this configuration. |

___

### `headers`
#### Description
Defines custom headers to be sent with OTLP requests.

#### Internal Logic
This block allows for the specification of key-value pairs representing HTTP headers.

___

### `api-key`
#### Description
A custom header for API authentication.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| api-key | string | The API key to be sent with OTLP requests. Set to `"test-key"` in this configuration. |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| tracing.enabled | boolean | true | Enables or disables tracing |
| tracing.exporter | string | "otlp" | Specifies the tracing exporter to use |
| tracing.sampling_ratio | float | 0.5 | Sets the sampling ratio for traces |
| tracing.otlp.endpoint | string | "http://localhost:9999" | Defines the OTLP exporter endpoint |
| tracing.otlp.headers.api-key | string | "test-key" | Sets the API key for OTLP requests |

This configuration file is likely used in a larger system to set up and configure tracing using OpenTelemetry. The settings defined here would be read by the application to initialize the tracing subsystem with the specified parameters.
